titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on 1H-Indene-1,3(2H)-dione, 2-(4-bromo-3-hydroxy-2- quinolinyl)-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/20/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 1H-Indene-1,3(2H)-dione, 2-(4-bromo-3-hydroxy-2- quinolinyl)-.
